10+ Years of Faithful Service

Building hope through education, food & care

For over a decade, Father's Love Foundation has provided food, shelter, education, and care for orphans in Africa. Your giving fuels meals, classrooms, and long-term stability for children who need it most. Our organization is dedicated to Samuel Wanjala's efforts to save the orphaned and Robert Graham's giving heart, to which this ministry is a legacy of that he left behind.

Our Mission

To renew hope for children who have endured loss.

We focus on three core areas that create lasting change for children and families in need.

Build & Support Education

Classrooms, supplies, and teacher support so children can learn consistently and build their futures.

  • Construction & maintenance
  • Supplies
  • Learning materials

Provide Food Relief

Food for vulnerable families and children.

  • Staple food
  • Shortage response
  • Community meals

Care for Orphans

Safe care, education, mentorship, and life support for orphans affected in the region.

  • School & tutoring
  • Nutrition and essentials
  • Holistic mentoring

Our Impact

What our donations & engagement make possible

This minsistry work began with a simple commitment: show up, stay faithful, and meet needs that matter. Over a decade, that's grown into schools, steady food support, and ongoing care for orphans.

1

Shelter

Building shelter to protect children from the elements and wildlife.

2

Food Security

Nutrition support through shortages and ongoing community needs.

3

Orphan Care

Education, essentials, and long-term support for vulnerable children.

See Full Impact Report
Get Involved

Ways You Can Help

As the Ministry grows and supports more children, we need more, and that is why this site exists. It is evidence of the success of our founders and supporters. Over the last decade we have had the privelage of watching this village grow and the fruit of those efforts present in the joy of the children that are given new hope there.

Donate

Your financial gift directly supports education, food programs, and orphan care. Every dollar makes a difference.

Father's Love Foundation

A registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization dedicated to building schools, providing food, and caring for orphans in Africa.
